DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Improving Metabolic Control Depressive Symptoms
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 18 old 2. medically stable type 2 diabetes HBA1c < 9 % . 3. significantly elevate depressive symptom measure score great equal 14 use Center Epidemiologic Studies Depression Tool ( CESD . 1. vitamin D level 32 ng/dl great 2. malabsorption problem ( e.g. , crohn 's disease , celiac sprue ) 3. hypercalcemialevel great 10.5 mg/dl 4 .
